document_data.name: The Whirlwind
document_data.mainbody: The '''Whirlwind''' was a legendary horse living in [[Zakhara]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Personality: The Whirlwind had a vicious temperament and actually appeared to enjoy fighting.
document_data.Activities: Shod with special steel shoes, the Whirlwind performed devastating attacks with his rider during raids on caravans traveling between [[Huzuz]] and [[Halwa]].
document_data.Relationships: The Whirlwind was ridden by [[Fasim Kaldur]], the leader of the [[Riders of Blood]].
document_data.Rumors and Legends: One rumor stated that Fasim was about to fall before a swarm of enemies, but his horse brutally attacked them in a whirlwind of bites and kicks, saving Fasim's life in the process.
